actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code to require the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs to pay the cost of installing headstones and markers furnished by him.

summary.text: Directs the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs to pay the cost of installing headstones and markers furnished by him. Sets limits upon the costs of such memorials under this Act. (Amends 38 U.S.C. 906)

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code to require the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs to pay the cost of installing headstones and markers furnished by him.
